        <header>
            <div class="hero">
                <img src="https://cryptorussia.ru/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/bit-lords.jpeg" alt="Bit Lords" width="350px" height="200px" style="border: 10.5px solid black">
                <h1 style="font-family: 'Verdana';font-size: 80px;">Gender Equality</h1>
                <p style="font-family: 'Verdana'; font-weight: bold; font-size: 28px;">Working towards a world free of bias, discrimination, and stereotypes.</p>
                <p style="font-family: 'Verdana'; font-weight: bold;">- By Bit Lords</p>
                <a href="#about" class="button">Tap the button to learn more</a>
            </div>
        </header>

        <section id="home">
            <div class="container">
                <h2 style="font-family: 'Gill Sans MT';font-size: 40px;"><u>Introduction</u>:</h2>
                <ul type= 'square'>
                    <p><li>Gender equality is not just a women's issue;<b>it's a fundamental human right.</b> </li></p>
                    <p><li>It's about creating a world where everyone, regardless of gender, has the opportunity to thrive and reach their full potential.</li></p>
                    <p><li>Gender equality, also known as sexual equality or equality of the sexes, is the state of equal ease of access to resources and opportunities regardless of gender.</li></p>
                    <p><li>It including economic participation and decision-making, and the state of valuing different behaviors, aspirations, and needs equally, also regardless of gender.</li></p>
                    <p><li>To avoid complication, other genders<b> (besides women and men) </b>will not be treated in this Gender equality article.</li></p>
                    <p><li><b>UNICEF (an agency of the United Nations) </b>defines gender equality as <b>women and men</b>, and <b>girls and boys</b>, enjoy the same rights, resources, opportunities and protections. </li></p>
                    <p><li>This is the world we strive for a world where talent is nurtured, not limited, and where everyone can contribute their unique gifts to society.</li><p>
                </ul>                    
            </div>
        </section>

        <section id="about" class="about">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="image">
                    <img src="https://img.freepik.com/premium-vector/boy-girl-study_1639-6710.jpg" alt="About Gender Equality" style="border: 5px solid black;">
                </div>
                <div class="text">
                    <h2 style="font-family:'Gill Sans MT'; font-size: 40px;"><u>About Us</u>:</h2>
                    <p>We are <u>a group of four Computer Science and Engineering students at <a href="https://prathyusha.edu.in/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i>Prathyusha Engineering College</i></a></u> and we passionate about promoting <b>gender equality</b> . </p>
                    <p>We believe in a world where everyone, regardless of gender, has equal opportunities to thrive.</p>
                    <p>We believe that everyone deserves the same opportunities, rights, and respect, regardless of their gender. <b>This is not just a cause for us; it's personal.</b></p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <section id="goals" class="goals">
            <div class="container">
                <h2 style="font-family:'Gill Sans MT'; font-size: 40px;"><u>Our Goals</u>:</h2>
                    <p>* <u>Educate</u>: To educate ourselves and our peers about the importance of gender equality and the impact of gender bias.</p>
                    <p>* <u>Advocate</u>: To advocate for policies and practices that promote gender equity within our college and the broader community.</p>
                    <p>* <u>Achieve full gender equality</u>: This is the ultimate aim, encompassing all aspects of life.</p>
                    <p>* <u>Create a gender-equal world</u>: A world where everyone has equal rights, opportunities, and treatment, regardless of gender.</p>
                    <p>* <u>Empower all women and girls</u>: Enabling women and girls to reach their full potential and exercise their rights.</p>
                    <h3 style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-weight: bold;">We believe that by working together, we can create a more just and equitable world for all.</h3>
            </div>
        </section>

        <section id="issues" class="issues">
            <div class="container">
                <h2 style="font-family: 'Gill Sans MT';font-size: 40px;"><u>Solutions</u>:</h2>
                <div class="issue">
                    <img src="https://i0.wp.com/kashmirobserver.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Education-Gender-Equality.jpg?resize=955%2C531&ssl=1" alt="Education" width=250px height=250px style="border: 5px solid black;">
                    <h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">Education</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Invest in women's education and economic empowerment</li>
                        <li>Teachers can use examples of women in different careers, like science and technology.</li>
                        <li>Parents can encourage kids to play with all kinds of toys and try different activities, regardless of whether they're traditionally seen as "for boys" or "for girls."</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div class="issue">
                    <img src="https://th.bing.com/th/id/OIP.IfFMWa4CAfIBnMFJGRlO3gHaEE?rs=1&pid=ImgDetMain" alt="Workplace" width=250px height=250px style="border: 5px solid black">
                    <h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">Workplace</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Organize workshops and events to educate employees about gender equality issues.</li>
                        <li>Support policies that allow parents to balance work and family responsibilities.</li>
                        <li>Encourage respectful communication between all employees, regardless of gender.</li>
                </div>
                <div class="issue">
                    <img src="https://www.bwint.org/web/image/391753" alt="Violence"  width="270" height="270"style="border:5px solid black">
                    <h3 style="font-family:'Segoe UI';">Violence</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Talk about how everyone deserves to be treated with respect, no matter their gender.</li>
                        <li>Teach about respecting other people's boundaries and saying no to things you're not comfortable with.</li>
                        <li>We need to work together to prevent this violence and create a world where everyone is safe and respected.</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div class="issue">
                    <img src="https://th.bing.com/th/id/OIP.aqNtbh0yifwW61bHlb5BHgHaFP?rs=1&pid=ImgDetMain" alt="Health" width="270" height="270" style="border: 5px solid black">
                    <h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">Health</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Everyone should have the same chance to become a doctor or nurse, no matter their gender.</li>
                        <li>Everyone should feel comfortable seeking healthcare, no matter their gender or sexual orientation.</li>
                        <li>We need to talk about how gender affects our health and how we can make things more equal.</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div class="issue">
                    <img src="https://images.yourstory.com/cs/4/ce3a22c0-b0f6-11e8-ac49-d10dfcb04889/Iceland_Gender_Equality1557725193193.png?fm=png&auto=format" alt="Politics" width="500" height="270" style="border: 5px solid black">
                    <h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">Politics</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>We need to talk about how gender affects politics and how we can make things more equal.</li>
                        <li>Women should feel safe and respected when they're involved in politics. We need to call out sexist comments and behavior.</li>
                        <li>It's important to remember that when women are involved in politics, everyone benefits.</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div class="issue">
                    <img src="https://th.bing.com/th/id/R.09625dabd8660a0bb72f7ed3dfae48d0?rik=okbk%2fp9FmD%2fMAw&riu=http%3a%2f%2fwww.copeam.org%2fwp-content%2fuploads%2f2020%2f12%2fimmagine-donne-media.jpg&ehk=WJh9JJpCjk%2ftpxTyBhGwcDyYkcp7GZ806cjh3rUPC1Q%3d&risl=&pid=ImgRaw&r=0" alt="Media" width="300" height="285" style="border: 5px solid black">
                    <h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">Media</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>We need to stop seeing the same old stereotypes about men and women in media. Women can be strong and powerful, and men can be sensitive and caring.</li>
                        <li>We need to talk about how gender is portrayed in media and how we can make things more equal.</li>
                        <li>When everyone has equal opportunities in the media, it's not just good for them, it's good for everyone to see all the amazing things that people can do.</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="issue">
                    <img src="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Yr7RFWNCjQs/Wx_iyq3DnJI/AAAAAAAAYUM/TapCzJyC-BoVT5Q5zqRGaeHetB2Vdt1VQCLcBGAs/w1600/Economic%2BGender%2BInequality.png" alt="Economic Inequality" width="300" height="285" style="border: 5px solid black">
                    <h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">Ecomonic Inequality</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>We need to make sure that everyone has the same access to education, training, and resources to succeed in their careers.</li>
                        <li>We need to talk about how gender affects our economic opportunities and how we can make things more equal.</li>
                        <li>Women are often paid less than men for doing the same job, and they're less likely to be in leadership positions.</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                
                <div class="ad">
                    <a href="https://3plusinternational.com/2020/03/10-inspirational-marketing-campaigns-that-promote-gender-equality/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">
                      <img src="https://3plusinternational.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/www.3plusinternational.com-2024-11-01T120919.488.png" alt="Advertisement" width="300" height="250">
                    </a>
                </div>

            </div>
        </section>

        <section id="benefits" class="benefits">
            <div class="container">
                <h2 style="font-family: 'Verdana'; font-size: 40px;"><u>Benefits of gender equality</u>:</h2>
                <p style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 20px;"><b>Gender equality is when people of all genders have equal rights and opportunities.<br>There are many benefits to gender equality, both for individuals and for society as a whole.</b></p>
                
                <div class="benefits">
                    <img src="https://theeducationdaily.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Promoting-Gender-Equality-in-Education-through-NEP-5-1140x651.jpg" alt="Education" width=250px height=250px style="border: 5px solid black;">
                    <h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">In Education</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>When girls and boys have equal access to education, everyone benefits.</li>
                        <li>Girls who are educated are more likely to be healthy, have children later in life, and earn more money.</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                
                <div class="benefits">
                    <img src="https://th.bing.com/th/id/R.0ff0f4cf09700b41921b942b85263de8?rik=2%2bIHM2od7dU1gA&riu=http%3a%2f%2fintheknow.insead.edu%2fsites%2fcontenthub%2ffiles%2f2019-11%2fUntitled+design+(4)_0.jpg&ehk=AHLZYbjbJ9cIasYNLGdSlhqHI06KyXfTO1kYiIGKH6k%3d&risl=&pid=ImgRaw&r=0" alt="Workplace" width=250px height=250px style="border: 5px solid black">
                    <h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">In Workplace</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>When everyone feels valued and respected, it creates a more positive and productive work environment.</li>
                        <li>Everyone deserves to be treated with respect and dignity at work, regardless of their gender.</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                
                <div class="benefits">
                    <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Relationship" width="250px" height="250px" style="border: 5px solid black">
                    <h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">In Relationship</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li> Gender equality leads to more fulfilling relationships. </li>
                        <li> people are treated as equals, they are more likely to have healthy and respectful relationships.</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                
                <div class="benefits">
                    <img src="https://th.bing.com/th/id/OIP.1a_WgwqhR1PWxAJT5_l-hAHaDB?rs=1&pid=ImgDetMain" alt="Safety" width=250px height=250px style="border: 5px solid black">
                    <h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">In Safety</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>When everyone is treated equally, there is less violence and discrimination. This makes communities safer for everyone.</li>
                        <li>When everyone is safe and respected, communities are stronger and more prosperous.</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="benefits">
                    <img src="https://themontrealherald.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/gender-equality-and-politics-780x470.jpg" alt="Safety" width=250px height=250px style="border: 5px solid black">
                    <h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">In Politics</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>When everyone is represented in politics, governments are more likely to make decisions that benefit everyone. </li>
                        <li>Gender equality in politics is essential for creating a more just and equitable world.</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class="benefits">
                    <img src="https://th.bing.com/th/id/R.a2339dcd5b7f0fdf4269d2b0aee11d92?rik=Nd6mJaVQu8ZglQ&pid=ImgRaw&r=0" alt="Safety" width=250px height=250px style="border: 5px solid black">
                    <h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI';">In Media</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>When everyone is represented in the media, it leads to more diverse and interesting stories being told.</li>
                        <li>When girls and women are represented in a variety of roles in the media, it provides them with more positive role models to look up to. This can help them to achieve their full potential.</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

            </div>
        </section>

        <section id="solutions" class="solutions">
            <div class="container">
                <h2 style="font-family:'Verdana';font-size: 40px;"><u>Key Solutions</u>:</h2>
                <p style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold;"><u>Here are the solutions for gender equality presented as concise points, categorized for clarity</u>:</p>
                <ul>
                    <li>Promote gender-responsive policies and legislation</li>
                    <li>Invest in women's education and economic empowerment</li>
                    <li>End all forms of violence against women and girls</li>
                    <li>Increase women's representation in leadership positions</li>
                    <li>Divide responsibilities fairly, regardless of gender. This sets a powerful example for children.</li>
                    <li>Support equal opportunities for girls and women in sports.</li>
                </ul>
                <p style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold;">By taking action in these areas, you can contribute to creating a more gender-equal world.</p>
            </div>
        </section>

        <section id="icons" class="icons">
            <div class="container">
                <h2 style="font-family:'Verdana';font-size: 40px;"><u>Icons about gender equality</u>:</h2>
                <p style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: 20px;"></p>
                <div class="image-container">
                    <img src="https://www.bing.com/th?id=OIP.NvcVDdv12ng4d1avT9gWOgHaFJ&w=312&h=200&c=8&rs=1&qlt=90&o=6&dpr=1.3&pid=3.1&rm=2" alt="Image" width="300px" height="300px" style="border:10px solid black">
                    <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barack_Obama" target="__blank" ref="noopener norefferer"><h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;">Barack Obama</h3></a>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Enhanced investing and innovation for women entrepreneurs through the Small Business Administration's ChallengeHER National Initiative, the InnovateHER Business Challenge, and the USPTO Women's Entrepreneurship Symposium</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div class="image-container">
                    <img src="https://th.bing.com/th/id/OIP.T6qnTR4FrvMSWhKKJ1yJJAHaGN?w=225&h=188&c=7&r=0&o=5&dpr=1.3&pid=1.7" alt="Image" width="300px" height="300px" style="border:10px solid black">
                    <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gra%C3%A7a_Machel" target="__blank" ref="noopener norefferer"><h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;">Graça Machel</h3></a>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Gender equality is the goal that will help abolish poverty that will create more equal economies, fairer societies and happier men, women and children.</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div class="image-container">
                    <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="Image" width="300px" height="300px" style="border:10px solid black">
                    <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malala_Yousafzai" target="__blank" ref="noopener norefferer"><h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;">Malala Yousafzai</h3></a>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Malala Yousafzai is a Pakistani activist who was shot in the head by the Taliban for speaking out about the importance of education for girls. She is the youngest Nobel Prize laureate and has founded the Malala Fund, which supports education for girls around the world.</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div class="image-container">
                    <img src="https://th.bing.com/th?id=ODL.b888a41f9a8eb720963897b5e5430fc1&w=138&h=185&c=10&rs=1&qlt=99&o=6&dpr=1.3&pid=AlgoBlockDebug" alt="Image" width="300px" height="300px" style="border:10px solid black">
                    <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emma_Watson" target="__blank" ref="noopener norefferer"><h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;">Emma Watson</h3></a>
                    <ul>
                        <li>She is a British actress and activist who is known for her work on gender equality. She is a UN Women Goodwill Ambassador and has launched the HeForShe campaign, which calls on men and boys to join the fight for gender equality.</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div class="image-container">
                    <img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/32/Prime_Minister_Trudeau%27s_message_on_Christmas_2023_%280m29s%29_%28cropped%29.jpg/330px-Prime_Minister_Trudeau%27s_message_on_Christmas_2023_%280m29s%29_%28cropped%29.jpg" alt="Image" width="300px" height="300px" style="border:10px solid black">
                    <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Justin_Trudeau" target="__blank" ref="noopener norefferer"><h3 style="font-family: 'Segoe UI'; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;">Justin Trudeau</h3></a>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Gender equality shouldn't be controversial – it's good social policy and smart economic policy. It creates jobs, strengthens our economy, and makes for everyone.</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>
